entry.title: Waiting For Us
entry.summary:
Author: quietmidnights

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 135,756Chapters: 15/15Kudos: 23

Summary: ‚ÄúChannie?‚Äù Felix whispers. He says it so quietly that Chan is only able to hear it because he saw his lips move. Chan nods. ‚ÄúChannie‚Äôs here, baby.‚Äù ‚ÄúC-Can I come over there?‚Äù ‚ÄúOf course,‚Äù Chan says softly. ‚ÄúAnd y-you won‚Äôt hurt me?‚Äù Chan doesn't let his tears fall. ‚ÄúNo, baby, I won‚Äôt hurt you. Never.‚Äù ‚ÄúDo you promise?‚Äù ‚ÄúI promise, Lix. I swear on my life.‚Äù He watches Felix swallow. ‚ÄúO-Okay,‚Äù he says quietly.When Chan first met Felix, he was quiet, bruised, and flinching at everything around him. Time softened fear into trust, and trust into an easy, sweet friendship ‚Äì one where everyone knew Felix was Chan‚Äôs favorite, and Chan was Felix‚Äôs safe space. But when feelings change into something new and a different kind of love starts to unfurl, Felix‚Äôs old fears resurface. Muscle memory developed through trauma and pain fights against the gentleness he knows he can trust. For Chan, loving Felix is so, so easy. It‚Äôs full of soft words, a steady presence, gentle care, unwavering kindness, and letting him move at his own pace until he can truly believe that this love is different, that he is safe, and that he will never be hurt again.

entry.title: Sugar
entry.summary:
Author: Changbinsthang

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,811Chapters: 12/15Kudos: 130

Summary: Felix never expected his job to lead him here: standing in his boss‚Äôs living room, heart pounding as Chris steps closer, voice low and controlled, asking him to name the boundaries he doesn‚Äôt want crossed. Their arrangement was supposed to be professional. Structured. Safe. But the air between them is tight with something neither is ready to acknowledge. When Chris invites Felix to a high-stakes company dinner as his plus one‚Äîwith the promise of subtle touches, whispered cues, and a rival CEO known for showing off‚ÄîFelix realizes this is no longer just practice. Each session pushes them further, blurring professionalism with want, caution with craving. --- Felix is technically Chris' sugar baby but it's never outright said.

entry.title: Overlap
entry.summary:
Author: odysseyofmemory

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,827Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 66

Summary: ‚ÄúI try not to ask for too much,‚Äù Chan says, taking the chopsticks gingerly from her hand. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs so rare for me to be selfish.‚Äù He takes another rice cake. Another. One more before he‚Äôs lifting one to her mouth, scrunching his nose in a silent command to open up. She doesn‚Äôt realize how obedient she is until she tastes the sweet heat of the sauce. Chan smiles. Only one dimple showing. He watches her chew, swallow. His thumb swipes at the corner of her mouth. Sucks on the pad of his finger. She can only stare at him, her pulse throbbing in her throat, between her legs. He takes the bowl from her. Sets it neatly in the sink. Traps her between his arms when he puts his hands on the counter behind her. ‚ÄúFor once in my life, I want to be selfish,‚Äù he whispers. And he‚Äôs close. So close. His breath hot on her lips, the tip of his nose bumping against the bridge of hers. ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt you?‚Äù ¬† or Everyone knows idols shouldn't date their staff. Chan's not sure if he cares anymore.

Everyone adores Chan ‚Äî kind, soft-spoken, always remembering customers‚Äô orders ‚Äî but Minho sees something off.Because Minho isn‚Äôt there for coffee.He‚Äôs there undercover.There have been a series of slow, subtle poisonings in the area, all linked to drinks or pastries from that same caf√© ‚Äî though no proof has ever surfaced. Minho, a detective who prides himself on reading people, is assigned to investigate.Except‚Ä¶ Chan doesn‚Äôt act like a killer. He‚Äôs warm. He‚Äôs lonely. And when he looks at Minho, there‚Äôs recognition. Something quiet and dangerous.As Minho gets closer, the story teeters between affection and suspicion ‚Äî are the smiles real, or bait? And when the final cup is poured, Minho realizes he‚Äôs in too deep: in love, or in danger ‚Äî maybe both.Or: A detective walks into a caf√© to catch a killer.He ends up falling for the man who might be one.
